raw_snippet: 204 Vibro-BIades A hundred miles away is a factory town. It looks like a cross between All vibro-blades are blade weapons surrounded by an invisible high- something out of World War II and the Jetsons. There are automobiles frequency energy field that gives them mega-damage capabilities. and hover craft, horses and power armor, giant robots and bicycles, Vibro-Knife: 1D6 M.D. gunpowder weapons and energy weapons, huge, clunky factories and Vibro-Saber (short sword): 2D4 M.D. micro-computers. There are also stores and places for entertainment, Vibro-Sword (larger, one-handed sword): 2D6 M.D. when most of the amenities we think of today are available.
